Text: Why would anyone want to download something that you cant avoid getting when getting the needed key? >_>

For people who wanna share friends codes trials that come with the game with online friends, and don't want to take the next fligth to another town or country to let them borrow your CDs.

Just one example.

And anyway, there are more reasons. Ponder you have several computers but limited bandwidth use, and you purchased the game online. Then you don't want to download the same game from SoE Station for each single install. Much better to download once and store or burn the DVDs for use.

This torrent is actually really useful. The Vanguard patcher is HORRIBLE!! I mean really really BAAD! I started it up on my 5th day of downloading with a game folder size of 16GB. 3h 20mins to go. I go to sleep for 7 hours. Get up. 4h 20mins to go. stop it. restart it 2h 40mins to go. An hour later it's back up to 5h 10mins. The patcher just can't maintain a reasonable rate of transfer. If you are going to buy the digital download version get the key then torrent the disks. It's MUCH faster.
